content:
routine work at the Duck Pond caused portions of OU to lose power for about  minutes Thursday afternoon said Chris Shilling university spokesman PERIOD

Shilling said construction workers tripped a power wire at about  p.m. which left various campus buildings without electricity PERIOD

Affected buildings included Lloyd Noble Center Gittinger Hall Copeland Hall Kaufman Hall Bizzell Memorial Library OU College of Law National Weather Center Traditions East Traditions West

Lauren Royston Housing and Food Services spokeswoman said the residence halls did not lose power and freshman movein day continued to run smoothly PERIOD

Check back with OUDaily.com for updates PERIOD

Robust news organizations like ours generate civic good that informs improves and inspires communities PERIOD For those invested in OU and Norman OU Daily uniquely has

title: Power outage caused by tripped wire, OU spokesman says | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
